tool_description: Analyzes and ranks potential peer companies based on business similarity, financial profile matching, and operational comparability for more refined comparable company selection.

target_company_data.description: Financial and operational data for the target company

peer_companies_data.description: Financial and operational data for potential peer companies

minimum_similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score to include in peer group (0-100)

max_peer_group_size.description: Maximum number of peers to include in final group

error_messages: Insufficient target company data: Target company requires comprehensive financial and operational data for comparison.
Invalid similarity weights: Weights must be positive numbers that sum to approximately 1.0.
No suitable peers found: No peer companies meet the minimum similarity threshold, consider lowering the threshold.
Data format mismatch: Target and peer company data must have consistent format and metrics.
usage: Provide target_company_data and peer_companies_data arrays, optionally customize similarity_weights and thresholds. Returns ranked peer group with similarity analysis.

selected_peer_group.description: Final selected peer companies with identifiers

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each selected peer (0-100)

peer_group_statistics.description: Statistical summary of the peer group characteristics

exclusion_summary.description: Summary of companies excluded and reasons
